Message.Title: AT&T returns look good for this segment ot the market ytd
Message.Msg: AT&T started off the year at $33.72 and depending on what time today you look is trading around $35.60. igoofy under his new osso id keeps damning the stock. ytd return as expected does trail the market at about 5.6%. Combine that with a 5% dividend and an investor is getting greater than a 10% return projected to year end. Performance seems pretty solid to me as an investor. So igoofy and your many id's what is the issue with a 10% or better return mid year?

Topic.Title: Let's Face It, AT&T Stock Is Nothing But A Junk Bond. As Interest Rates Rise T Will Fall Further.
